description:
AS SEEN IN
• TechCrunch Disrupt Startup Battlefield Top 26 Finalist from over 700 companies
• Inc. Magazine “How to Build a Killer Mobile App”
• Mashable.com “5 Can’t Miss Apps"
• Davey Awards “Gold Award for Sports & Recreation"
• Tabby Awards - Finalist for Best Sports App

Velocity Free measures speeds up to 40 mph (64 kph) for free.  Use in app purchases to unlock higher speeds for individual radars or download Velocity Ultimate to own all speed radars for just one price.  You can also use this version as a free "GameLink" client to mirror speeds from other people's devices who own Velocity.

-----

Introducing Velocity by Athla - the world’s first, truly hands-free, professional grade speed radar app for sports. 

Just place your device, play, and speeds appear. Two years of research and development has made Velocity into the equivalent of a $1,200 sports performance radar that is accurate to within +/- 0.7 mph of the Stalker Pro II is used by over 30 professional teams.  

Velocity is only possible today because of the incredibly increased hardware power in Apple’s latest devices.

COMPLETELY HANDS FREE
• Just place your iPhone or iPad about 20 feet away and 20 feet to the side and simply kick, pitch or serve in-line and in-view of your device.
• The speed of your baseball pitch, soccer kick, cricket bowl, or tennis serve appears on the surface of your device.
• Velocity uses only the camera in your device.
• Use Velocity on a field, rink or court, or simply in a backyard at home.

HIGH TECH PERFORMANCE
• Velocity calibrates to within +/- 0.7 mph of the Stalker II Pro ® , a $1,200 speed radar used by over 30 professional teams.
• The accuracy can exceed Doppler radars on balls with vertical trajectories.
• See athla.com/blog for calibration details and more

DISCOVER AND TRACK YOUR INNER ATHLETE
• Five sports available now: Baseball, Softball, Tennis, Cricket and Soccer
• Discover the speed of your pitches, serves, and kicks
• Over 500,000 data points are trackable. Track your improving speeds across coaching sessions, the sports season, or across several years.
• Share speeds with coaches to show what you have achieved.

CONNECT WORLDWIDE
• Compare your pitch, serve and kick speeds to friends across the season.
• Discover unrealized talent in yourself and others.
• Coaches can track the speeds of an entire team and discover unrecognized improvement.
• Geotag locations to unlock message boards. Find friends in your local neighborhood. No one ever has to practice alone.

BRING THE STADIUM HOME
• Mirror your speeds on up to seven other devices
• Bring the stadium experience home to your own community.
• Audiences can see the speeds as players practice or play similar to professional games.
• Add Bluetooth connected speakers, turn on “Voice Announce”, and Velocity will speak the speeds to the team or an audience.

MORE
• Optimized for outdoor use only.
• Use Apple’s latest hardware for best performance. 
• Maximum speeds detected of 110 mph on iPad Air, iPad 4th Gen, iPad 3rd Gen, iPad Mini 2nd Gen, and iPhone 5s. 
• Maximum 100 mph for iPhone 5 and 5c. 
• Maximum 40 mph for iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Gen.
• Apple's iPad Air gives the best performance due to the built-in motion stabilization in its video camera.

CONTACT
e: support@athla.uservoice.com

Velocity by Athla - Achieve the Shot Your Remember for a Lifetime
trackCensoredName: Athla Velocity: World’s First Hands-Free Speed Radar for Baseball, Softball, Tennis, Soccer and Cricket (Free)
trackName: Athla Velocity: World’s First Hands-Free Speed Radar for Baseball, Softball, Tennis, Soccer and Cricket (Free)
releaseNotes:
• Now you can try Velocity for free! All radars detect speeds up to 40 mph for free.
• MPH or KPH can now be set manually from Settings
• Soccer has a higher noise threshold.
• New buttons to contact us for support and share Velocity with your friends are now integrated.
• Numerous usage improvements and bug fixes
